alert.note: Alert for Aguila Valley; Cave Creek, New River; New River Mesa; Northwest Valley (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 23 at 3:48PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa County through 430 PM MST... At 347 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Wickenburg, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. Hail may be strong enough to cover the ground. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wickenburg, New River, Morristown and Lake Pleasant. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 17 between mile markers 234 and 241. US Highway 60 between mile markers 104 and 122. AZ Route 74 between mile markers 1 and 4. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Aguila Valley; Cave Creek, New River; New River Mesa; Northwest Valley
